actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 5051 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 (relating to the Federal excise tax on beer).

summary.text: Provides that the first 60,000 barrels of beer brewed by a brewery in the United States producing less than 2,000,000 barrels annually for consumption shall be taxable under the Internal Revenue Code at a rate of $7 per barrel (as opposed to the flat rate of $9 per barrel presently imposed).

titles.title: A bill to amend section 5051 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 (relating to the Federal excise tax on beer).
